pages.title: Brewing Infusions
pages.text: The $(item)Kettle$() really shines when used to prepare $(item)Infusions$(), the highest tier of witchcraft magic.

pages.title: Step-by-Step
pages.text: $(8)1.$() Throw the ingredients into a heated, water-filled Kettle. $(l:altar/altar)Altars$(/l) provide power, if needed.$(p)$(8)2.$() Fill the brew into an empty $(item)Glass Bottle$().$(p)$(8)3.$() For infusions, use them in a Rite of Infusion ($(l:circle_magic/infusion/light_infusion)Light$(/l), $(l:circle_magic/infusion/earth_infusion)Earth$(/l), $(l:circle_magic/infusion/infernal_infusion)Infernal$(/l), $(l:circle_magic/infusion/otherwhere_infusion)Otherwhere$(/l)); but remember, death is almost always assured.

pages.title: Infusion Power
pages.text: Every type of Infusion comes with great powers. Some are $(item)passive$(), meaning that are active all the time, while others require a $(l:artifacts/tools/witch_hand)Witches Hand$(/l) to focus them.$(p)Using active powers drains the energy the infused creature has, and when they run out of it, most powers cease to function.$(br)The energy level is indicated by the Infusion energy bar.

pages.title: Recharging Power
pages.text: All infusions will draw from the magical energy imbued at the time of the $(l:circle_magic/infusion/light_infusion)Rite of Infusion$(/l). To recharge the infusion energy the infused creature can perform the $(l:circle_magic/infusion/charge_infusion)Rite of Charging$(/l).$(p)For those who seek alternative ways, it might be possible to slowly recharge infusion energy by being worshipped by a sufficiently large number of $(l:creatures/hobgoblin#worship)Hobgoblins$(/l).

pages.title: Inf. Brew of Soaring
pages.text: Can be drunk to allow significantly better control when flying with an $(l:creatures/enchanted_broom)Enchanted Broom$(/l), increasing top speed, turning and deceleration for 120 minutes. Bonuses stack with the ones of an $(l:artifacts/familiars/owl_familiar)Owl Familiar$(/l). Can be made with the proper $(l:circle_magic/infusion/soaring_infusion)Rite of Infusion$(/l).

pages.title: Inf. Brew of the Grave
pages.text: Can be drunk to extend $(l:artifact/misc/necromantic_stone)Necromantic Stone$(/l)'s control on all undead creatures. This ability can be used once every 30 seconds.$(p)Additionally, when killing animals, $(item)Villagers$() or other players, the witch will regain hunger and a little health, as they feed off the victim. This effect lasts 120 minutes.
